name: util/config/common
description: Get and set values in the configuration table.

strategies.name: get-config
strategies.description:
Get the value for the specified key from the config table.
The key is the current term.

strategies.name: get-configs(pred)
strategies.description:
Get all values of config keys for which 'pred' succeeds.
The current term is ignored.
params: Is applied to the keys of the config table.

strategies.name: get-config-keys(pred)
strategies.description: Get all config keys for which pred succeeds
params: Is applied to the keys of the config table.

strategies.name: set-config
strategies.description: Set an entry (key and value) in the config table.

strategies.name: rm-config
strategies.description: Remove the entry of the specified key from the config table.

strategies.name: toggle-config
strategies.description:
Adds an entry to the config table if it does not exist, or
removes the entry if it does already exist in the config table.

strategies.name: extend-config
strategies.description:
Extends the list of values of the specified key with new values.
The values are added in front of the current list.

strategies.name: post-extend-config
strategies.description:
Extends the list of values of the specified key with new values.
The values are added to the end of the current list.

strategies.name: if-java-platform(s)
strategies.description: Evaluates a strategy f if and only if the program is compiled to Java.

strategies.name: if-c-platform(s)
strategies.description: Evaluates a strategy f if and only if the program is compiled to C.
